professionalSummary: Highly skilled Frontend Developer with over two years of experience in creating dynamic, responsive web applications. Proficient in React.js, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS. Adept at collaborating with cross-functional teams and delivering user-centric designs to enhance user experiences.

responsibilities: Developed and optimized web applications using React.js, Next.js, and TypeScript.
Created responsive user interfaces with Tailwind CSS and Bootstrap, enhancing user experience.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement innovative solutions.
Ensured design consistency and attention to detail in all deliverables.
Designed and developed responsive web applications using Bootstrap, HTML, and CSS.
Enhanced user experience through efficient front-end design and code optimization.
Worked closely with the academic team to ensure project alignment with university goals.
Assisted in developing interactive web pages using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Implemented features and ensured responsiveness across various devices.
Gained practical experience in web development and front-end technologies.

freelanceProjects.name: DivergeGPT
freelanceProjects.description: Designed the user interface and experience of a ChatGPT-based file-reading assistant. Created wireframes, conducted a SWOT analysis, and developed flow charts to map out user interactions and navigation pathways.

techSkills: JavaScript, TypeScript, React.js, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap, Responsive Web Design
